title: Railway & Hot Springs
subTitle: 鐵道海線：山海對話與礁溪療癒
intro: A dialogue between the mountains and the sea. Visit the architectural marvel of Lanyang Museum and soak in the 'Beauty Soup' of Jiaoxi.

spots.name: Lanyang Museum (蘭陽博物館)
spots.description: Designed by Kris Yao, the 'Cuesta' shape architecture emerges from the wetland, symbolizing Yilan's rock formations. A gateway to understanding local culture.

spots.name: Tangweigou Hot Spring Park (湯圍溝溫泉公園)
spots.description: Experience the unique 'Dr. Fish' foot spa. Jiaoxi's sodium bicarbonate spring is one of the few flatland hot springs in Taiwan.

spots.name: Waiao Beach (外澳沙灘)
spots.description: Gaze at Turtle Island (Guishan Island) across the ocean. A perfect spot for surfing or just relaxing by the black sand beach.

title: Scallion Farming & Capybaras
subTitle: 田園療癒：蔥田綠意與萌寵互動
intro: Experience farm-to-table education in Sanshing. Pull your own scallions, make pancakes, and feed adorable capybaras.

spots.name: Sanshing Scallion Farm (三星蔥農場)
spots.description: Wear rain boots and step into the fields. Learn to harvest and wash the famous Sanshing scallions, then make your own scallion pancake.

spots.name: Zhang Mei Ama's Farm (張美阿嬤農場)
spots.description: A hit with kids and couples. Feed capybaras and sika deer in a Japanese-style garden setting.

spots.name: Luodong Forestry Culture Park (羅東林業文化園區)
spots.description: Witness the history of the timber industry. The park preserves old log ponds, steam trains, and Japanese-style dormitories.

title: Crafts & Whisky Legend
subTitle: 文藝復興：傳藝經典與威士忌傳奇
intro: From traditional indigo dyeing to world-class whisky. A journey through Yilan's cultural heritage and modern industrial pride.

spots.name: National Center for Traditional Arts (國立傳統藝術中心)
spots.description: A living museum of Taiwanese crafts. Experience indigo dyeing, woodcarving, and watch traditional opera performances.

spots.name: Kavalan Whisky Distillery (金車噶瑪蘭威士忌酒廠)
spots.description: Visit the distillery that beat Scotland in blind tastings. Admire the copper pot stills and taste the award-winning Solist series.

spots.name: Jimmy Park (幾米廣場)
spots.description: Located near Yilan Station. Life-sized sculptures from Jimmy Liao's picture books create a whimsical photo spot.

title: Cloud Forest & Cold Spring
subTitle: 雲端秘境：太平山鐵道與蘇澳冷泉
intro: Ascend to 2000m for the misty forest railway and descend to sea level for the world-rare cold springs. A vertical journey of temperature.

spots.name: Taipingshan Bong Bong Train (太平山蹦蹦車)
spots.description: Ride the open-air yellow train through the cypress forest. Walk the Jianqing Historic Trail, one of the world's most beautiful paths.

spots.name: Jiuzhize Hot Spring (鳩之澤溫泉)
spots.description: Boil corn and eggs in the volcanic hot spring water. The unique flavor is a must-try mountain experience.

spots.name: Suao Cold Spring (蘇澳冷泉)
spots.description: One of only two carbonated cold springs in the world. The 22°C water feels cold at first but warms you up from the inside.

title: Yilan Grand Tour
subTitle: 經典全覽：從北疆海洋到南方平原
intro: The ultimate triangle route covering the head (Toucheng), heart (Yilan City), and foot (Suao) of Yilan. Ideal for first-timers.

spots.name: Luodong Night Market (羅東夜市)
spots.description: Try the famous 'Mutton Soup' and 'Gao Zha' (fried broth). A true taste of Yilan's warm hospitality.

spots.name: Dongshan River Ecoark (冬山河生態綠舟)
spots.description: Take a boat through the 'Mysterious River Channel'. A stunning view of trains passing overhead and limestone caves.

spots.name: Nanfangao Fishing Port (南方澳漁港)
spots.description: Visit the Golden Mazu Temple and enjoy fresh seafood. The home of the mackerel fish industry.

title: Tribal Wisdom & Hidden Gems
subTitle: 深度慢旅：原民智慧與職人三日
intro: For the seasoned traveler seeking authenticity. Deep dive into Atayal tribal life and visit the meditative Zhuangwei Sand Dunes.

spots.name: Bulao Tribe (不老部落)
spots.description: Requires booking months in advance. Experience a self-sufficient ecosystem, weaving culture, and French-style indigenous fine dining.

spots.name: Wanglongpi (望龍埤)
spots.description: A serene lake surrounded by mountains. Visit 'Crab Bubbling' (natural spring) nearby.

spots.name: Zhuangwei Sand Dune Park (壯圍沙丘旅遊服務園區)
spots.description: Designed by Huang Sheng-Yuan, featuring exhibitions by director Tsai Ming-Liang. A space for solitude and artistic reflection.

title: Offshore Island: Guishan Island (Turtle Island)
subTitle: 龜山島：登島賞鯨與牛奶海
intro: An active volcano island shaped like a turtle. Famous for the 'Milk Sea' phenomenon and whale/dolphin watching cruises.
transportation: **Boat Tour** from Wushi Harbor (Toucheng) is required. Pre-booking is essential.

spots.name: Milk Sea (牛奶海)
spots.description: A stunning phenomenon where sulfur from the underwater volcano mixes with seawater, creating a Tiffany-blue color.

spots.name: 401 Highland (401高地)
spots.description: Challenge the 1706 steps to the summit for a 360-degree view of the turtle's head and the surrounding ocean. (Requires permit).

spots.name: Whale & Dolphin Watching (賞鯨豚)
spots.description: The waters around the island are rich in marine life. Spinner dolphins are frequently seen jumping out of the water.
